people.name: Logan S. Perez
people.description1: Experienced algorithmic crypto trader and a machine learning evangelist.
people.description2: I’m focusing on the logic behind the combination of analysis tools, neural networks and genetic algorithms for optimization. Always wanted to have a trading bot with more features but never had the time to build a solution beyond basic python technical analysis tracker.
